channel.title: Devolution v7 Help
channel.description: how can i make it so you can type ::starter or when u first log in you have the stuff needed like 25mill? Thanks

item.title: Devolution v7 Help
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Here… I’ll write you a small tutorial.

Declare this anywhere…

Public Int PlayerStarted = 0;

Then, add this command…

if(PlayerStarted == 0){ WHAT THE PLAYER GETS HERE. PlayerStarted += 1; } else { SendMessage("You already got your starter!"); }

Then search for something like this…

} else if (token.equals("character-posy")) { toY = Integer.parseInt(token2) == -1 ? 3377 : Integer.parseInt(token2);

Add underneath of it this…

} else if (token.equals("character-PlayerStarted")) {
						PlayerStarted = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Then search for something like this…

characterfile.write("character-height = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(heightLevel), 0, Integer .toString(heightLevel).length()); characterfile.newLine();

After characterfile.newLine(); add this…

characterfile.write("character-PlayerStarted = ", 0, 26); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(PlayerStarted), 0, Integer .toString(PlayerStarted).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution v7 Help
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

That means an integer (int) is undeclared. I’m unsure where the actual declaration would be, sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution v7 Help
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

i get this

client.java:3912: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable starter
location: class client
if(starter == 0){
^
client.java:3913: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable starter
location: class client
starter = 1;
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution v7 Help
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

add this and they can only do it once

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(995, 50000000); addItem(386, 2000); addItem(1171, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(882, 100); addItem(1323, 1); addItem(1333, 1); addItem(561, 100); addItem(563, 100); addItem(554, 100); addItem(556, 100); q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3= 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; } [code/]

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution v7 Help
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

There’s a code for making a field in the user’s file change to 1, I’m not sure what it is. Just add an if() case inside to change it upon use and if it is already changed, not to use it again.

Read full topic
